clients.notes: Has 2 medium dogs (labs). Needs fenced yard. Works remote so home office space important.
Pre-approved with Wells Fargo. Looking to close by April. Wants investment potential.
Current tenant at 215 Palm Dr. Great tenant, always pays on time. Wants to stay in Dunedin.
Relocating from Atlanta for work. Closing on 890 Bay Blvd on March 5. Needs fast timeline.
Just moved to area. Nurse at Mease Countryside. Needs something close to hospital.
Owns 4 rentals already. Looking for 5th. Cash buyer. Wants 8%+ cap rate.
Leased 412 Cypress Ln in October. Happy with the place. Has a cat.
Young professional, just got engaged. Looking for 2BR+. Toured 4 places last week. Very interested in Clearwater Beach area.
Purchased 1450 Sunset Dr in August 2025. First-time homebuyer. Very happy. Good referral source.
Rented 330 Oak St for 2 years. Moved out of state to Oregon. Could return.

activities.title: Toured 670 Patricia Ave
activities.description: Showed 3BR/2BA in Dunedin. Sarah loved the layout and yard. Main concern: no W/D hookups. Spent 45 minutes.

activities.title: Toured 890 Pinehurst Rd
activities.description: 3BR/2BA with fenced yard. Has W/D. Smaller than she wanted (1,250 sqft). 20 minute visit.

activities.title: Follow-up after showings
activities.description: Sarah texted back saying she's still thinking about Patricia Ave. Asked if landlord would install W/D.

activities.title: Toured 445 Bayshore Blvd
activities.description: 4BR/3BA, pool, 2-car garage. James very interested. Within budget at $449K. Wants to make offer.

activities.title: Pulled comps for 445 Bayshore
activities.description: CompAtlas report showing comparable sales $425K-$470K range. Property fairly priced.

activities.title: Lease renewal discussion
activities.description: Maria called to ask about renewal options. Wants to stay but hoping for same rate. Current: $2,000/mo. Market suggests $2,100-$2,200.

activities.title: Inspection scheduled
activities.description: Home inspection for 890 Bay Blvd scheduled for Feb 18. Inspector: Pinellas Home Inspections.

activities.title: Initial intake completed
activities.description: Ashley is a travel nurse starting at Mease Countryside next week. Needs a place within 15 min of hospital. Budget tight but flexible on size.

activities.title: Toured 3 condos in Clearwater Beach
activities.description: Showed Marcus and his fiancée 3 units. They loved the Gulf views at 1200 Gulf Blvd #305 but it's at top of budget ($2,400). Also liked 880 Mandalay.

activities.title: Viewed 6 listings online
activities.description: Marcus viewed multiple Clearwater Beach listings. Focused on 2BR condos with pool access. Spent most time on waterfront units.

activities.title: Sent investment analysis
activities.description: Emailed Robert cap rate analysis on 3 potential investment properties. Best one: triplex on Alt 19 showing 8.3% cap rate.

activities.title: 90-day check-in
activities.description: Called Jennifer for quarterly check-in. Everything going well at 412 Cypress. No maintenance issues. Happy tenant.

transactions.notes: Renewed once. Good tenant. Moved to Oregon.

aiProfiles.summary: Sarah Chen is an active rental client looking for a pet-friendly 3BR/2BA home in Dunedin or Palm Harbor, budget $2,200-$2,600/month. She has two medium Labrador mixes and needs a fenced yard. Her current lease at 412 Main St expires March 15, 2026 (29 days). She's viewed 8 properties in the last 30 days but hasn't committed — the main blocker is finding pet-friendly options with W/D hookups in her target areas. She works remotely and values a dedicated home office space. Priority: HIGH due to imminent lease expiration.

nextActions.title: Send new listing: 725 Virginia Ln
nextActions.description: 92% match — pet-friendly 3BR/2BA with fenced yard AND W/D hookups in Dunedin. $2,350/mo. This checks every box.

nextActions.title: Follow up on 670 Patricia Ave
nextActions.description: Sarah spent 45 minutes at this showing (longest of any tour). Check if landlord will install W/D — this could be the one.

nextActions.title: Lease expiration planning
nextActions.description: 29 days until current lease expires. Schedule a call to discuss backup plan if preferred properties don't work out. Consider month-to-month extension at current place.

aiProfiles.summary: James Rodriguez is a pre-approved buyer ($500K) targeting 3BR/2BA single-family homes in Dunedin, Clearwater, or Safety Harbor, budget $350K-$475K. He wants investment potential and needs a pool and garage. He toured 445 Bayshore Blvd yesterday and is very interested — comps confirm fair pricing at $449K. He's motivated to close by April 2026. Priority: HIGH — ready to make an offer.

nextActions.title: Prepare offer for 445 Bayshore Blvd
nextActions.description: James is ready. Comps support $425K-$470K range. Recommend offering $440K with escalation clause to $455K.

nextActions.title: Coordinate with Wells Fargo lender
nextActions.description: Contact Mike Davis to confirm pre-approval is current and get rate lock options before submitting offer.

aiProfiles.summary: Maria Gonzalez is a current tenant at 215 Palm Dr, Dunedin. Excellent payment history, no issues. Her lease expires April 1, 2026 (46 days). She wants to renew but is hoping to keep the current $2,000/mo rate. Market analysis shows comparable rents at $2,100-$2,200. She's been a client since March 2025 and is low maintenance. Priority: MEDIUM — renewal conversation needed.

nextActions.title: Prepare renewal offer
nextActions.description: Draft lease renewal at $2,100/mo (5% increase, still below market). Include RentAtlas comp report to justify. Maria is a great tenant — small increase keeps her happy and you competitive.

aiProfiles.summary: Ashley Williams is a new lead — travel nurse starting at Mease Countryside Hospital next week. Needs a 2BR within 15 minutes of the hospital, budget $1,500-$2,000/mo. She's currently in temporary housing so timeline is URGENT. Best areas: Safety Harbor, Clearwater, Dunedin. No pets, flexible on amenities except needs W/D. Priority: HIGH — immediate housing need.

nextActions.title: Send top 3 matches immediately
nextActions.description: Ashley needs a place this week. 2200 McMullen Booth Rd #112 is 85% match at $1,750. Find 2 more options and send all three today.

nextActions.title: Schedule showings for tomorrow
nextActions.description: Given urgency, try to book 2-3 showings for Feb 15. Ashley works nights so mornings/early afternoon best.

aiProfiles.summary: Marcus Johnson is a hot rental lead recently engaged, looking for a 2BR/2BA in Clearwater Beach area, budget $1,800-$2,400/mo. He's toured 4 properties last week and showed strong interest in both 1200 Gulf Blvd #305 ($2,400, at top of budget) and 880 Mandalay Ave #210 ($2,200). He's been actively viewing listings online, focused on waterfront condos with pool access. Target move: March-April 2026. Priority: HIGH — close to decision.

nextActions.title: Check availability on both top picks
nextActions.description: Confirm 1200 Gulf Blvd #305 and 880 Mandalay #210 are still available. Marcus is close to deciding.

nextActions.title: Send side-by-side comparison
nextActions.description: Create a comparison of the two units — price, sqft, amenities, proximity to beach. Help Marcus and his fiancée make a confident decision.

triggers.title: Lease expires in 29 days
triggers.description: Sarah's lease at 412 Main St expires March 15. She hasn't secured a new place yet.
triggers.messageDraft: Hi Sarah! Just checking in — your lease is up in about a month. I have a great new listing at 725 Virginia Ln that checks all your boxes (3BR, fenced yard, W/D, pet-friendly). Want to take a look this week?

triggers.title: Lease expires in 46 days
triggers.description: Maria's lease at 215 Palm Dr expires April 1. She wants to renew. Need to prepare renewal offer.
triggers.messageDraft: Hi Maria! Your lease is coming up for renewal on April 1st. I'd love to have you stay — let's chat about renewal terms this week. When works best for a quick call?

triggers.title: New client — 24hr follow-up
triggers.description: Ashley signed up 2 days ago and needs immediate housing. Follow up with property matches.
triggers.messageDraft: Hi Ashley! Welcome to the area! I found a few places near Mease Countryside that might work for you. Can I set up some showings for tomorrow?

triggers.title: Quarterly check-in due
triggers.description: Jennifer's last check-in was Jan 15. Next quarterly touchbase due mid-April.

triggers.title: 6-month post-purchase check-in
triggers.description: Linda purchased 1450 Sunset Dr 6 months ago. Good time for a check-in and referral ask.
triggers.messageDraft: Hi Linda! Can you believe it's been 6 months since you closed on Sunset Dr? Hope you're loving the place! If any friends or family are looking to buy or rent in the area, I'd love to help them out.

triggers.title: Post-showing follow-up
triggers.description: Marcus toured 3 condos on Feb 10. Follow up on his favorites.
